data.name: MonsterGIRL-扩展包
data.detailed_description:
The new content


This DLC is free and adds new stories for 5 characters.
data.about_the_game:
The new content


This DLC is free and adds new stories for 5 characters.
data.short_description: To play, you need to have the base game Monster Girl on Steam.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, ormay not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content,General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of18.
